snippet: Billy Joel is making an effort at concerts to generate new value from his extensive catalog.
abstract: Ben Ratliff Critic's Notebook notes concert by Billy Joel at Barclays Center, his first in Brooklyn in decades, as well as upcoming residence at Madison Square Garden; holds that Joel has managed to maintain constant audience since 1970s through combination of excellent management and appeal to middle-aged audience; says next challenge is to tailor his extensive song catalog to appeal to younger audience.
lead_paragraph: Billy Joel is making an effort at concerts to generate new value from his extensive catalog.

headline.print_headline: A Blender of Genres Squeezes More Juice
headline.seo: Billy Joel’s New Year’s Eve Concert at Barclays Center
headline.main: A Blender of Genres Squeezes More Juice
